column5: Went out for the usual bike ride with the family and stopped to catch a couple carp tonight.          Hopefully I get out again tomorrow before I head north for work for a few days.
Very nice Dan. Thinking of going carpin myself this weekend.
Thanks for the report Dan, the weather was pretty nice today.
Sounds great! Take a nice bike ride catch some fish. Pretty good.
Look at you go man, i don't think you were skunked once in that pond lol. Great report and nice fish.
Nice fish there Dan, what was the bait of choice? I may give carp a go this weekend at a local pond as well.  Thanks for the mini report.
Now that looks like mini fun place to play around with carp!!!   Gotta love watching them feed in the shallows and then taking your hook bait. Always a great thrill.   DSN
I hate you......................        because you are so awesome at fishing! lol  Awesome report, I'll have to give the Niagara a go for carp, apparently they are hot right now.
Nice job, might give them a try this weekend.
